photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

UserFavorites.title: User Favorites
UserFavorites.description: Represents a user's favorite leagues, teams, and players.

leagues.description: A map of favorite league IDs to league data.

teams.description: A map of favorite team IDs to team data.

players.description: A map of favorite player IDs to player data.

AdminFavorite.title: Admin Favorite
AdminFavorite.description: Represents a team and a note favorited by an admin.

customName.description: The custom name for the league.
The custom name for the country.
The custom name for the continent.

MatchDetails.title: Match Details
MatchDetails.description: Stores metadata about a match, like whether comments are enabled.

commentsEnabled.description: Whether comments are enabled for this match.

MatchComment.title: Match Comment
MatchComment.description: A single comment on a match, which can be a top-level comment or a reply.

userId.description: The ID of the user who posted the comment.

userName.description: The display name of the user.

userPhoto.description: The profile picture URL of the user.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the comment was created.

Notification.title: Notification
Notification.description: Represents a notification for a user.

ManagedCompetition.title: Managed Competition
ManagedCompetition.description: Represents a competition that is managed by an admin.

Prediction.title: Match Prediction
Prediction.description: A user's prediction for a specific match.

UserScore.title: User Score
UserScore.description: Total prediction score for a user.

LeaderboardEntry.title: Leaderboard Entry
LeaderboardEntry.description: Represents a single entry in the predictions leaderboard.

GlobalPredictionMatch.title: Global Prediction Match
GlobalPredictionMatch.description: Represents a single match selected for global predictions.

DailyGlobalPredictions.title: Daily Global Predictions
DailyGlobalPredictions.description: A document containing the list of globally selected matches for a specific day.

SeasonPrediction.title: Season Prediction
SeasonPrediction.description: A user's prediction for a league's champion and top scorer for a season.

NewsArticle.title: News Article
NewsArticle.description: A single news article created by an admin.

ManualTopScorer.title: Manual Top Scorer
ManualTopScorer.description: A manually entered top scorer for the Iraqi league.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public profile information for each user.

/users/{userId}/notifications/{notificat.description: Stores notifications for a specific user.

/favorites/{userId}.description: A single document containing all favorites for a user.

/adminFavorites/{teamId}.description: Stores admin-favorited teams and their notes, keyed by team ID.

/leagueCustomizations/{leagueId}.description: Stores custom names for leagues, keyed by league ID.

/countryCustomizations/{countryName}.description: Stores custom names for countries, keyed by the English country name.

/continentCustomizations/{continentName}.description: Stores custom names for continents, keyed by the English continent name.

/teamCustomizations/{teamId}.description: Stores custom names for teams, keyed by team ID.

/playerCustomizations/{playerId}.description: Stores custom names for players, keyed by player ID.

/coachCustomizations/{coachId}.description: Stores custom names for coaches, keyed by coach ID.

/matches/{matchId}.description: Stores metadata for a specific match, identified by its unique ID.

/matches/{matchId}/comments/{commentId}.description: Stores all comments and their replies for a specific match. Replies are nested within parent comment documents.

/managedCompetitions/{leagueId}.description: Stores the list of competitions managed by the admin.

/predictions/{predictionId}.description: Stores user predictions for matches. ID is a composite of userId and fixtureId.

/seasonPredictions/{predictionId}.description: Stores user predictions for a season's champion and top scorer. ID is composite of userId, leagueId, and season.

/leaderboard/{userId}.description: Stores user scores for the prediction leaderboard.

/dailyGlobalPredictions/{date}.description: Stores the list of globally-predictable matches for a given day (date format YYYY-MM-DD).

/news/{articleId}.description: Stores news articles created by admins.

/iraqiLeagueTopScorers/{scorerId}.description: Stores manually entered top scorers for the Iraqi league.
